trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGME110_04941_SEQ_00<tab>Otis looks pleased with himself, insofar as his vessel can indicate.
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Taapu.
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Otis.
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_WUKLAMAT_000_001<tab>We'll have to ask Cahciua what she knows. And if she's been hiding things from us, we need to know why.
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_ALISAIE_000_005<tab>As many Endless as those who have died... So where are they? And how have they been “living” up until now?
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_GULOOLJA_000_010<tab>Why are you all making those serious faces...?
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_OTIS_000_020<tab>Although the mood became a tad subdued at the end, I thoroughly enjoyed our repast together!
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_WUKLAMAT_000_021<tab>We did too, Otis. To hear about the Endless was something of a shock, but we likewise enjoyed your company.
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_WUKLAMAT_000_022<tab>Above all, I'm glad that you and I could talk, Gulool Ja. We're going to get along great, I just know it!
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_GULOOLJA_000_023<tab>You...you think so?
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_OTIS_000_024<tab>Hahaha! I'm happy for you, my boy!
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_OTIS_000_025<tab>Now then, I presume you will be returning to Everkeep. Permit me to accompany you at least a part of the way.
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_WUKLAMAT_000_030<tab>About Sphene...
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_WUKLAMAT_000_031<tab>It doesn't matter to me if she's an Endless. Whether she's “alive” like you and me or not.
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_WUKLAMAT_000_032<tab>I've seen enough to know that she has a good heart.
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_WUKLAMAT_000_033<tab>What worries me is the burden she bears. We still don't know what it is.
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_WUKLAMAT_000_034<tab>I expect there are things she can't tell us. Not with Zoraal Ja watching. But at the very least, I'd like to know what the Endless are to her.
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_WUKLAMAT_000_035<tab>...Sorry, I didn't mean to delay us. I just felt the urge to share my thoughts with you.
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_WUKLAMAT_000_036<tab>Oh, on the way back, let's make a quick stop at the driftdowns. I want to tell Taapu how it went.
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_WUKLAMAT_000_037<tab>Gods, but that yam stew was good...
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_TAAPU_000_038<tab>Ah, you are returned. Were you able to find Gulool Ja?
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_WUKLAMAT_000_039<tab>We were thanks to you. All's well with the boy.
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_TAAPU_100_039<tab>I'm relieved to hear that.
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_TAAPU_110_039<tab>And to know that he has family who worries for him. Gulool Ja too must be glad.
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_WUKLAMAT_120_039<tab>Heh, I hope so. I'll try not to rush or force anything, though. It's for him to decide what I am to him.
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_SPHENE_130_039<tab>My, what a pleasant surprise it is to meet you in these parts.
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_WUKLAMAT_140_039<tab>Sphene! What are you doing here?
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_SPHENE_150_039<tab>Visiting my people. Are you doing the same, perchance?
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_WUKLAMAT_160_039<tab>I suppose we are, yes...
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_WUKLAMAT_170_039<tab>Listen, there's something we'd like to talk to you about. Could we have a word in private?
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_SPHENE_180_039<tab>...So you know about the Endless.
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_SPHENE_190_039<tab>While we may not discuss it openly, my people will have surely noticed that I haven't changed for hundreds of years. I've made no attempt to conceal my nature.
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_SPHENE_200_039<tab>If I may ask, though, who was it that told you about the Endless? Only a few should be familiar with the concept.
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_WUKLAMAT_210_039<tab>I'm afraid I can't say...
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_SPHENE_220_039<tab>I bear no ill will towards this mystery individual, lest that be your concern. I'm merely curious.
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_WUKLAMAT_230_039<tab>Tell me, Sphene. You care for your people, that much is plain. And I assume you care for the Endless too.
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_WUKLAMAT_240_039<tab>Earlier, in Everkeep, there was something that you wanted to tell us. Was it to do with them?
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_SPHENE_250_039<tab>The Endless are as dear to me as my living citizens. They are as much my family.

TEXT_KINGME110_04941_SPHENE_260_039<tab>But they can only be sustained by meeting certain exacting requirements. Thus far we've managed to do so, but should more people die, I fear we would be pushed beyond our limit.
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_SPHENE_270_039<tab>Their preservation demands vast amounts of energy...
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_WUKLAMAT_280_039<tab>Energy? I don't understand the workings of it all, but is there something we can do to help?
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_SPHENE_290_039<tab>Then...
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_SPHENE_300_039<tab>Would you be willing to become Alexandrian citizens?
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_WUKLAMAT_310_039<tab>Wh-What!? I have my nation─my people─to protect. I can't just become Alexandrian...
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_SPHENE_320_039<tab>Indeed...I suppose you cannot.
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_WUKLAMAT_330_039<tab>First you tell us to make peace, then you tell us to go home... What exactly is it that you want?
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_SPHENE_340_039<tab>The same as you, of course. To protect my people.
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_A1_000_001<tab>Tell us more about the energy the Endless need.
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_A1_000_002<tab>Is there something that only Zoraal Ja can do?
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_SPHENE_350_039<tab>That...I cannot say. I do not ask that you understand or like me. But I wish...
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_SPHENE_360_039<tab>I wish we had been born on the same side of it.
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_WUKLAMAT_370_039<tab>Hey, what do you mean by that? Wait! Sphene!
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_WUKLAMAT_380_039<tab>Damn it...
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_WUKLAMAT_390_039<tab>Well, I think we've kept everyone waiting long enough. Let's continue on to Everkeep.
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_WUKLAMAT_400_039<tab>And let's not tell Otis about our conversation with Sphene. I don't want to risk causing him pain.
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_WUKLAMAT_000_040<tab>I've gone ahead and apologized for us.
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_ALISAIE_000_045<tab>A lot has happened, but the important thing is Gulool Ja is safe and well. Cahciua has been worried, so let's hurry back.
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_GULOOLJA_000_050<tab>Eating together was fun. I hope we can do it again.
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_TAAPU_000_055<tab>Thank you for stopping by to share the news. It gladdens me to know that Gulool Ja is in good hands.
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_ALISAIE_000_060<tab>Lamaty'i is right. Let's have faith in everyone and do what we can.
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_WUKLAMAT_000_070<tab>This is the moment of truth. We have to hold Zoraal Ja here.
TEXT_KINGME110_04941_WUKLAMAT_000_071<tab>And I know exactly how to do that!
